title: Hey, powers that be.
content: Can I suggest a Typophile Type Battle?
author: Hiroshige

comments.content:
By all means. Go ahead!

Note: But if you want to max out the chances of seeing it happen, email Zara.

Hey, Hiroshige.

email us your suggestions! typophile at punchcut dot com.

Hey Zara, you've got mail :)

Thx
